addedToWorld(World) - Method in class Vehicle
This method is called automatically when the Vehicle is added to the World, and places the Vehicle just off screen (centered 100 pixels beyond the center of the lane spawner) so it will appear to roll onto the screen smoothly.

Z

zSort(ArrayList<Actor>, World) - Static method in class VehicleWorld
A z-sort method which will sort Actors so that Actors that are displayed "higher" on the screen (lower y values) will show up underneath Actors that are drawn "lower" on the screen (higher y values), creating a better perspective.
